description_html: With the Isabella Sofa, Frank Ponterio designed an integral arm rest that, no matter a person’s height, they will feel supported. "Often with a higher arm rest, a person can feel awkward, but this design element adds comfort without bulk," says Ponterio. "It was meant to solve a problem. The piece is 'masculine but pretty,' a phrase I quite like, offering an adaptable and accessible feel that works in a variety of settings and aesthetics." The welt around the back of the sofa means it can “float” in a space and that it looks good from all angles.
